disabled.description: Boolean if the switch is disabled.

defaultToggled.description: Boolean if the switch is toggled on by default.

toggled.description:
Boolean if the switch is toggled on. This will make the switch
a controlled component which requires the `onChange` prop to be
set.

onChange.description:
An optional function to call when the toggled state changes.
It will be called with the next toggled state and the click event.

`onChange(!toggled, event)`.

value.description: An optional value to apply to the switch.

label.description: An optional label to display with the switch.

labelBefore.description: Boolean if the label should appear before the switch.

id.description: An optional id for the switch.
